title: 11/23/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 11/23/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-The Raiders are officially back

-The Packers can't win when you hit them in the mouth

-Taysom Hill is duct tape and that's what Sean Payton needed

-Where Colin was right, where Colin was wrong

-Joe Burrow's injury was predictable in that organization


Guest: Howie Long, NFL on FOX & Hall of Fame Defense End 


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
